SDG_GOAL: Objective 7. Guarantee access for all to reliable, sustainable and modern energy services at an affordable cost
SDG_TARGET: 7.1 By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services
STAT_CONC_DEF: It is the total quantity of electrical energy delivered to customers and billed, whether nationally or outside the country, it is expressed in GWH sold.
COLL_METHOD: Centralized database operation, collection is done daily
COMPILING_ORG: The compilation of data for the calculation of this indicator is done by the statistics and planning service of the MHEM.
INST_MANDATE: ISTEEBU is the body recognized by the Burundian government for the collection, processing and dissemination, after validation, of official statistics helping in planning and decision-making.
RATIONALE: The indicator is relevant because it reflects the quantity of electricity sold
REC_USE_LIM: It is interesting to know if all the electricity production is sold and what is the proportion of the revenues coming from this sale.
DATA_COMP: Sum of the total amount of electrical energy delivered to customers and billed
DATA_VALIDATION: Data from administrative sources are most often validated by the Technical Committee for Statistical Information (CTIS).
COVERAGE: The indicator is available at national level
COMPARABILITY: The indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international level
OTHER_DOC: REGIDESO and ABER annual report / MINHEM statistical yearbook
